posts.post_content: Interested in whatever you have in poor condition (beaters welcome). I'd like to be at $10-$12 per card for commons. Interested in HOF, SL as well at adjusted price points but just trying to provide a price point reference. Not opposed to large lots.

take a look and let me know what you think!
[url]http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=225559[/url]

NJ :]
Thanks but I have both of those. Just started back up after selling off about 2 years ago and only have about 100...but includes both of those. Thanks again.
